    • timeSortingAlgorithm

      public static long timeSortingAlgorithm(String sortMethod, int[] array)
      Times how long a sorting method takes to sort an array.
      Parameters:
      sortMethod - A String identifying which sort to use
      array - The array to sort
      Returns:
      execution time in nanoseconds

    • nanosToMillis

      Converts nanoseconds to milliseconds for easier reading

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)

    • testElements

      public static void testElements(int[] testArray)
      Tests all five sorting algorithms on the provided array and displays performance comparison results. This method runs each sorting algorithm (Bubble Sort, Selection Sort, Insertion Sort, Merge Sort, and Quick Sort) on a copy of the test array, measures the execution time for each, and prints a formatted comparison of their performance in milliseconds.
      Parameters:
      testArray - the array of integers to be sorted by each algorithm
